title: "Fractal Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website! Here you will find a collection of mesmerizing wallpapers inspired by the Mandelbrot set. Our abstract shapes and monochromatic color schemes are perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your desktop or mobile device. With our easy-to-use interface, you can quickly browse through our selection and find the perfect wallpaper to match your style. Whether you're looking for something bold and vibrant or subtle and understated, we have something for everyone. So why wait? Start exploring our collection today and elevate your digital space to the next level!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set, in a monochromatic color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
